Trade/Device Name(s): Stratus® CS Acute Care™ CardioPhase® hsCRP TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute Care™ CardioPhase® hsCRP CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute Care™ CardioPhase® hsCRP DilPak
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Stratus CS Acute Care CardioPhase hsCRP TestPak, CalPak, and DilPak for high-sensitivity CRP testing on Stratus CS analyzer using RPIA technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of C-reactive protein in lithium and sodium heparin plasma as a marker for infection, tissue injury, inflammation, and as an independent risk/prognostic marker for cardiovascular disease and events.
